edge_1: Fabbrizio Disguisey decides to keep his family's nature a secret from his infant son Pistachio due to the dangerous future lifestyle his lineage has had. In the present day, Fabbrizio runs an Italian restaurant with his wife and son Pistachio in America.
edge_2: After Fabbrizio's disappearance, Pistachio is visited by his grandfather who reveals Pistachio's heritage and begins training him to continue the family tradition as a secret agent known as 'Masters of Disguise'.

edge_1: Pistachio hires Jennifer Baker, who is confused about what the job entails but eventually proves herself as his assistant.
edge_2: After Fabbrizio's disappearance, Pistachio is visited by his grandfather who reveals Pistachio's heritage and begins training him to continue the family tradition as a secret agent known as 'Masters of Disguise'.
